definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: A comma should only be used to separate function arguments.
sentences.chinese: 逗號只能用於分隔函數的自變量。

sentences.english: Ensures that all functions in an expression have the correct number of arguments.
sentences.chinese: 確保表達式中所有函數的自變量數量正確。

sentences.english: What is wrong? Well, we don't have actually four independent variables.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，並沒有四個獨立的自變量。
